welcome.sectionDescription: Self-thought nerd with 22+ years of experience (in gaming). I am always ready for new challenges, reaching for the highest level. I never back down from fighting, not even from the scariest Bug. When it comes to a difficult task, teamwork wins ! So letâ€™s have a chat, build a hero team to fight bugs and make the world a better place !
